title: Community Meeting
description: There will be a community meeting held on May 20th, 2024 at 6:00 PM in the clubhouse. All residents are encouraged to attend.

title: Garbage Collection Schedule Change
description: Starting May 25th, 2024, the garbage collection schedule will change to every Monday and Thursday. Please take note of the new schedule.

title: Pool Maintenance
description: The community pool will be closed for maintenance from June 1st to June 5th, 2024. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
